Factor analysis name: Multifactor EFA: Groups differ in # of factors and configuration of loadings
Interpretation: Groups differ in meaning of construct

Factor analysis name: Configural: Same # of factors, loadings = 0 for same items
IRT explanation: Non-uniform DIF: Groups differ  in all item characteristics
Interpretation: Groups express construct in different ways

IRT explanation: Non-uniform DIF: Groups differ  in all item characteristics
Interpretation: Groups express construct in different ways

IRT explanation: Uniform DIF: Equal item discriminations (a = a_g)
Interpretation: Groups express construct in similar ways

Factor analysis name: Scalar (strong): Equal item factor loadings & item intercepts
IRT explanation: No DIF: Equal item discriminations & item difficulties (a = a_g, d = d_g)
Interpretation: Factor scores are on same scale and can be compared across groups

IRT explanation: No DIF: Equal item difficulties (d = d_g)
Interpretation: Factor scores are on same scale and can be compared across groups

Factor analysis name: Full (strict): Equal item factor loadings, intercepts, residual variances
IRT explanation: Not possible [because no residual variances with binary items in IRT]
Interpretation: Factor scores are on same scale and can be compared across groups; Reliabilities also equivalent

Factor analysis name: Group Mean Difference: Equal latent variable means
IRT explanation: Group Mean Difference: Equal latent variable means
Interpretation: Group A and Group B have same means on the latent construct

Factor analysis name: Group Variance Difference: Equal latent variable variances
IRT explanation: Group Variance Difference: Equal latent variable variances
Interpretation: Group A and Group B have same variances on the latent construct
